description:
In this course we will learn from the very basic to advanced web development. We will learn HTML5, CSS3, Twitter Bootstrap, Javascript, jQuery, AJAX, Python, Django, SQL, PostgreSQL, GIT, Sublime Text, Chrome Dev Tools and create a Reddit clone web application and deploy it to Heroku so you can have your application up and running on the internet.

After this course you will be able to create everything that's in your mind and it will be very easy to you to jump from one technology to another such as Node js, Java, C++, game development, mobile apps development and so on.

All you need to have is the will to learn and become a real modern web developer.
title: The Complete Modern Web Development Course
